segments.advisor_message: Okay, so before we wrap up, I just need to ask you for the name of your dependent, like the full name, y'know?
segments.client_message: Um, yeah, it’s uh, Sarah Miles. I think that’s—

segments.advisor_message: Got it, Sarah Miles, right? Now, what’s her date of birth? Just the DD-MM-YYYY bit.
segments.client_message: Uh, she was born on um, 15-06—no, sorry, 15-06-2015!

segments.advisor_message: Cool, and um, one last thing. Is there a date until she’s still considered a dependent?
segments.client_message: Oh, right! It’s like, until she’s 18, so that’s—um, I think 15-06-2033?
